name: Chef K9
description:
This game is the final project of the Gourmet Interactive group. The course was taken Fall 2021 in DMST 120 at the University or Rochester New York. 

The game is an adventure game where you are a chef's dog. You have to navigate your owners property to reach your end game of a delicious steak. You will have to dodge enemies that will make your tummy hurt such as grapes, almonds, and chocolates. You will also need to avoid distractors like aquariums and squirrels. 

Credits: 

Director: Mr. Luke Black

Creative Director: Mr. Samson Tsegai

Lead Programmer: Captain Alexander D. Kleerup

Art Designer: Mr. Jose Cervantes Escamilla

Professor: Dr. Joseph A. Loporcaro

Made on Game Maker Studio 2
